item.description:
directions to Mount Roberts Location: Northeast of Lake Winnipesaukee East of the town of Center Harbor, NH. Driving (one way from Nashua, NH): Distance: 85 miles Time: 1 hour 50 minutes Parking: at road-end parking lot by the gate house for Castle in the Clouds If you use a car GPS, here are the road-end parking lot coordinates (in degrees and minutes): N 43 43.896 W 71 19.514 Roads: - Everett Turnpike north - Route 93 north to Exit 23 - Route 104 east - Route 3 north - Route 25 northeast through Moultonborough - Route 109 southeast (for 2.2 miles) - Route 171 southeast (for 0.5 miles) - Ossipee Park Road (for about 1.2 miles)

Hiking (LOOP): Distance: 7.5 miles Time: 5.5 hours Trail: Mt. Roberts Trail 

Trail Guide: AMC Southern NH Trailguide Trail Map: Hiking Trails of the Castle in the Clouds Conservation Area published by Lakes Region Conservation Trust GPS Track: Mount Roberts GPS Track Hiking (one way, up to the summit): Distance: 2.5 miles Vertical: 1300 feet Time: 1 hour 50 minutes Summit: Wooded summit with directional view, plus ledge views along the trail Height: 2582 feet

Winter Accessibility: Available year round
item.how_to_find_us: WE WILL BE IN A SILVER SUBARU LEGACY
item.name: MT ROBERTS AND FARAWAY MTN IN THE OSIPEE RANGE
